body_html:
@meteorcloudy my python is in D:\anaconda\

$ printenv PATH
/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/opt/bin:/c/Windows/System32:/c/Windows:/c/Windows/System32/Wbem:/c/Windows/System32/WindowsPowerShell/v1.0/:/d/anaconda
$ printenv PYTHON_BIN_PATH
D:\anaconda\python.exe

and I don't have anything like /usr/bin/env: I am using MSYS with all executables in /d/msys/usr/bin
Redefining PYTHON_BIN_PATH to /d/anaconda or /d/anaconda/python doesn't help, same error.
I even tried creating /d/msys/usr/bin/env and copying python there: this resulted in a bit different error:

____Building...
____[0 / 8] Executing genrule @protobuf_archive//:protos_python_genrule
ERROR: D:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1562:1: Executing genrule //tensorflow/core:version_info_gen failed (Exit 126).
/usr/bin/bash: tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.py: /usr/bin/env: bad interpreter: Permission denied

$ printenv PATH

$ printenv PYTHON_BIN_PATH

and I don't have anything like /usr/bin/env: I am using MSYS with all executables in /d/msys/usr/bin

____Building...
____[0 / 8] Executing genrule @protobuf_archive//:protos_python_genrule

body:
@meteorcloudy my python is in D:\anaconda\
```
$ printenv PATH
/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/opt/bin:/c/Windows/System32:/c/Windows:/c/Windows/System32/Wbem:/c/Windows/System32/WindowsPowerShell/v1.0/:/d/anaconda
$ printenv PYTHON_BIN_PATH
D:\anaconda\python.exe
```
and I don't have anything like /usr/bin/env: I am using MSYS with all executables in /d/msys/usr/bin
Redefining PYTHON_BIN_PATH to /d/anaconda or /d/anaconda/python doesn't help, same error.
I even tried creating /d/msys/usr/bin/env and copying python there: this resulted in a bit different error:
```
____Building...
____[0 / 8] Executing genrule @protobuf_archive//:protos_python_genrule
ERROR: D:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1562:1: Executing genrule //tensorflow/core:version_info_gen failed (Exit 126).
/usr/bin/bash: tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.py: /usr/bin/env: bad interpreter: Permission denied
```
